abstract: The CTIA, the wireless industry trade group, is making an overture to Apple to attend its conference and trade show next year.
snippet: The CTIA, the wireless industry trade group, is making an overture to Apple to attend its conference and trade show next year.
lead_paragraph: Apple does its own thing when it comes to trade shows and press events. But the CTIA, the wireless industry trade group, is making an overture to Apple to attend its conference and trade show next year. The lure: an app extravaganza.

headline.main: Will Apple Show Up at Next Year’s Phone Show?
